thread.title: Broader review of Perth City Council may be needed after new trip disclosure revelations, minister says
thread.title_full: Broader review of Perth City Council may be needed after new trip disclosure revelations, minister says - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Broader review of Perth City Council may be needed after new trip disclosure revelations, minister says
text: A broader review of the operations of Perth City Council may be needed after weekend revelations that Deputy Mayor Rob Butler failed to properly declare an overseas trip, Local Government Minister Tony Simpson says. ...
